name: Micro Adventure in a Dark Alley
name_original: Micro Adventure in a Dark Alley
description:
Help Milosevitch to retrieve his stolen artifact by investigating the neighborhood to get past the 3 bastards blocking the path to the evil Stanilas, this piece of trash!

The game will be a investigation 2d platformer, with dialogs and searching. No combat, no inventory. Unlockable area through the game like dark souls, with shortcut and secret passage. Estimated duration: 2 hours (I hope).

Music from Debmaster:

https://soundcloud.com/debmaster

Game currently in development, a demo is available for Windows! (single runtime installer, windows10 and antivirus may whine about it...)

Follow me at https://twitter.com/Hephepteamofone !
